rule.name: Shared profile
rule.narrative: This rule detects the AppDynamics agent usage.

threshold.message: AppDynamics monitoring agent is used. Make sure it is configured properly to not impact the application performance.

rule.name: Operation presence
rule.narrative: This rule detects the usage of the interception of methods with the AppDynamics agent.

threshold.message: Interception of methods with the AppDynamics agent is performed. Make sure it is configured properly to not impact the application performance. Check also the monitored method(s) in the stack.
AppDynamics creates some contention within the application while trying to correlate data. There is a risk of performance decrease. Check the stacks in the report.

AppDynamics creates high contention within the application while trying to correlate data. Performance is impacted. You may consider deactivating Appdynamics or investigate its configuration and relative stacks in the report.

rule.name: Function and operation parallel contention
rule.narrative: This rule detects any contention on a AppDynamics map while looking for database connection keys.

threshold.message: Contention on an internal AppDynamics db connection key map. Please verify the performance impact. If confirmed, disable the AppDynamics monitoring feature or get help from an expert
Severe contention on an internal AppDynamics db connection key map. Please verify the performance impact. If confirmed, disable the AppDynamics monitoring feature or get help from an expert.
